Method Detail

transform

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Transform a value with an XSLT transform",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="source",type="String",description="the source to transform"),@IPSJexlParam(name="stylesheetName",type="String",description="the URI of the stylesheet to apply")})
public java.lang.String transform(java.lang.String source,
                                                                          java.lang.String stylesheetName)
Transforms an XML string with XSLT. Convenience method without parameters

Parameters:
source - the source string. Must be well formed.
stylesheetName - the name of the stylesheet, relative to the Rhythmyx root.
Returns:
the result of the transform.

transform

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Transform a value with an XSLT transform",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="source",type="String",description="the source to transform"),@IPSJexlParam(name="stylesheetName",type="String",description="the file: URL of the stylesheet to apply"),@IPSJexlParam(name="params",description="XSLT parameters for stylesheet")})
public java.lang.String transform(java.lang.String source,
                                                                                       java.lang.String stylesheetName,
                                                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
Transforms an XML string with XSLT. The source will be wrapped in a <div class="rxbodyfield">. The source may contain multiple elements, but otherwise must be well formed.

The parameters may be referenced with <xsl:param... as a direct child of the <xsl:stylesheet> node.

Parameters:
source - the source string.
stylesheetName - the name of the stylesheet, relative to the Rhythmyx root. This should be a file url. For example: file:rx_resource/stylesheets/myStylesheet.xsl
params - a map of parameter names and values.
Returns:
the transformed source

wrapField

private static java.lang.String wrapField(java.lang.String field)
Wraps a field in <div class="rxbodyfield">

Parameters:
field - the field to wrap
Returns:
the wrapped string. Never null or empty.
